sentences.sContent: I was sickened by the way Carol charmed all the men by turning coy.
sentences.sCn: 我对卡罗尔忸怩作态哄诱男人的方式感到恶心。

synos.tran: 腼腆的；忸怩作态的；怕羞的

remMethod.val: 和boy及toy一起记； a coy boy plays toys(害羞男孩玩玩具)

trans.tranCn: 腼腆的, 怕羞的, 卖弄风情的
trans.tranOther: A coy person is shy, or pretends to be shy, about love and sex
